third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Petro is very strong here, but maybe Zurab is in favour. It's 50-50, but a little bit maybe because they have a lot of power here.

Petro Marharint.previous_match_summary: After his first loss, he won right, left, all matches.

Zurab Tavberidze.previous_match_summary: Had the title three times and then lost against Tata Ashings.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Very difficult to hook Laletin. Very difficult to top roll him. Morozov has better endurance, but in a bad position, he might spend more energy.

Vitalii Laletin.strength: Super strong in side pressure and hook
Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: After his Dubai match, he is very difficult to open.

Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Huge and in top shape, one more month to prepare.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik is a little bit more favourite because he has more competition, more active, but Irakli's hooking ability is super strong.

Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Improved a lot with the hooker.

Evgeny Prudnik.health: Not in good shape one month ago

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Sasho has a lot of endurance, the hook is amazing. If Sasho comes prepared, in good shape, he will win.

Davit Samushia.previous_match_summary: Won Worlds, Europeans, Zloty Tur, and eight matches in a row.

Sasho Andreev.previous_match_summary: Needs to lose 3-4 kilos for the match.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Tom is very strong. He dominated everyone at the Europeans.

Tom Rozits.previous_match_summary: Beat Oleg Zok with right arm, dominated at Europeans.

Artem Taranenko.previous_match_summary: Beat many heavier guys, won with Todd Akin.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Carolina did very well at the Europeans. Olga is the current champion of the Russian Nationals at 60 kilos.

Carolina Pettersson.previous_match_summary: Did very well at the Europeans.

Olga Terpelova.previous_match_summary: Current champion of the Russian Nationals at 60 kilos.
